title: James Galway Program 3
brief_description: Famous flautist, James Galway, introduces Nigel Kennedy, the violin virtuoso, with Peter Pettinger on piano to perform “Notta” by Manuel de Falla, 1st movement of a sonata by Ravel, Gershwin’s “2nd Prelude”, Gershwin’s “1st Prelude” and finally “Alls Blues” by Miles Davis. Rated: G
